title: Canyon Roadlite updates flat bar hybrid city road bike, now in the US in carbon & affordable alloy
content:
The 2022 Canyon Roadlite finally makes its way across the Atlantic, giving US cyclist a quick new flat bar road option for a city runabout or fitness bike.
